titleStmt.title: The character of a true subiect, or The loyall fidelity of the thrice honourable lord, the Lord Marquesse Huntley expressed in this his speech in the time of his imprisonment, by the Covenanters of Scotland, anno 1640. Together with the fruitlesse hopes of rebellious insurrections, and warres taken in hand, against God his lawes, and their Princes prudent government.
titleStmt.author: Huntly, George Gordon, Marquess of, d. 1649.
